= Introduction =

This is the current roadmap for development.

= Milestones =
  * [GxGeo10 GxGeo v1.0] - Large ROM support (early January)
  * [GxGeo15 GxGeo v1.5] - Maintenance (mid February)
  * [GxGeo20 GxGeo v2.0] - Menu system implemented (mid March)
  * [GxGeo30 GxGeo v3.0] - Merged with gngeo (late May)
  * [GxGeo35 GxGeo v3.5] - New front-end implementation (mid July)
